token.description: Gets the JWT token response that must be inclued in the header of all API requests. Add it to the Authorization header prefaced by Bearer.

refreshToken.description: Use this token to request a new token

expirationSeconds.description: Duration in seconds when the token will expire

isAdmin.description: If the user has permissions as an administrator

isGuest.description: If the user has permissions as a guest user

id.description: The ID of the ad break

timeCode.description: The timecode of the ad break in the format of hh:mm:ss:ff

score.description: The calculated score of the ad break from the AI analysis. The higher the better.

adBreakType.description:
The type of the ad break (pre-roll, post-roll, mid-roll)

Preroll

Midroll

Postroll

tags.description: The list of tags that are targeted with this ad break

labels.description: The list of labels that are targeted with this ad break

etag.description: The etag that was returned from the client upload

assetId.description: The Asset ID where the upload will become

etag.description: Determines if the asset has been uploaded. If it has, the etag is there, else null.

startDate.description: The date the original upload was started

existingAssetId.description:
The Existing AssetId (file) that should be overwritten with this upload.
Note that by specifying this attribute then the parentId, relativePath and displayName are all ignored.

relatedAssetId.description: The related asset ID of the existingAsset that we're replacing. If this is used, most of the other properties are not needed.

relatedContentId.description:
The Content ID of the related content record to associate this asset to.
Note that by specifying this attribute then the parentId and relativePath attributes are both ignored.

parentId.description:
The Parent AssetId (folder) to add the upload to. Note that if there is a full relativePath, then it is appended to this parent path. If this value is omitted then the file will be added to the predefined incoming folder.
This is ignored if the ExistingAssetId or if the RelatedContentId has a value

relativePath.description:
The filename to upload - or a full path with the filename at the end.
This is ignored if the ExistingAssetId or if the RelatedContentId has a value

languageId.description: The language of the asset to upload. If this is left blank then the default system language is used.

displayName.description:
The display name of the file to upload (does not include the path) and must include the file extension
This is ignored if the ExistingAssetId has a value

contentLength.description: The size of the asset to upload. This is used to calculate the upload parts.

chunkSize.description: The size of the upload chunks. This should be adjusted to optimize the upload size based on the user's internet connection.

uploadOverwriteOption.description:
If the file already exists on the server, this decides how to handle the situation

Cancel

Continue

Replace

properties.description: The additional custom properties for the uploaded file

actionArguments.description: Note that we convert all incoming keys to lower first char to help with serialization for JSON later

displayName.description: The visual name of the asset for display purposes

displayDate.description: The visual date of the asset for display purposes

customProperties.description: A list of custom properties that should be saved for the asset. To remove a property value, set the value to null

password.description: The existing password of the user for verification

newEmail.description: The new email of the user

password.description: The existing password of the user for verification

newPassword.description: The new password of the user

name.description: The name of the collection that should be added or removed. If the name and the collectionId are both specified, the name is ignored.

PageTypes.description:
1 = Page

2 = PageTemplate

3 = PageFileTemplate

4 = Redirect

5 = PageWithRoute

6 = PageWithRouteItem

7 = CustomRenderer

automatchFaceCount.description: The count of faces that are automatched for this person

probableMatchFaceCount.description: The count of faces that have been identified as probable matches for this person

confirmedMatchFaceCount.description: The count of faces that have been marked as confirmed for this person

notMatchFaceCount.description: The count of faces that have been marked as not a match for this person

celebrityConfidence.description: The % confidence of the celebrity name that was automatically detected through AI

celebrityExternalId.description: The external (usually IMDB) ID of the celebrity that was identified

matchedFaces.description: The list of face IDs that match this person. This list contains only changed faces that have become matched.

unmatchedFaces.description: The list of face IDs that do not match this person. This list contains only changed faces that have become not matched.

blurryFaces.description: The list of face IDs that are blurry. This list contains only changed faces that are marked as blurry.

numberOfLockedDays.description: Number of days to lock schedule

refreshToken.description: The RefreshToken from the Login response

operator.description:
0 = Equals

1 = NotEquals

2 = Contains

3 = NotContains

4 = LessThan

5 = GreaterThan

6 = LessThanEquals

7 = GreaterThanEquals

SearchFilterOperators.description:
0 = Equals

1 = NotEquals

2 = Contains

3 = NotContains

4 = LessThan

5 = GreaterThan

6 = LessThanEquals

7 = GreaterThanEquals

pageSize.description: The size of the page (the number of items returned for this page)

pageOffset.description: The offset of the page (zero based).

searchQuery.description: A text string to search within all of the text fields to match

filters.description: A list of the filters to apply for this search

filterBinder.description:
Tells the query engine of the Filters should be applied as an And or an Or (the default is And)

0 = And

1 = Or

searchResultFields.description: The list of fields and optionally the sub fields and related records that should be returned as a result

isRestricted.description: This has the impact of not allowing downloading or clipping in the portal UI

identifiers.description: Note that we convert all incoming keys to lower first char to help with serialization for JSON later
